content: *these one-row stars are very fast to crochet and they would look great hanging on the christmas tree adding a personal touch to gift wraps strung into garlands glued on cards used as appliques - the possibilities are endless * **size** a little under 6cm 2 ¼ tall if made with sport weight cotton schachenmayr catania 125m/50g and 2 25mm us size b hook you can use thicker or thinner yarn for different sizes **tools and materials ** ~ yarn or thread about 3 5m / 4yd if using sport weight with b hook - any weight it will only influence the finished size ~ hook matching your chosen yarn i suggest using a hook 1-2 size smaller than the yarn label s recommendation for tight and firm stitches ~ pair of scissors yarn needle ~ for starching pva glue white glue elmer s glue or decoupage glue small jar or bowl paintbrush corrugated cardboard covered in plastic wrap and pins
